titles.title: To permit continued financing of Government operations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Rules Committee Resolution H. Res. 976 Reported to House. Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3326, H.J. Res. 64, H.R. 4314 and H.R. 2847.
Considered under the provisions of rule H. Res. 976.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3326, H.J. Res. 64, H.R. 4314 and H.R. 2847.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H.R. 4314.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to the rule.

vote.text: On passage Passed by recorded vote: 218 - 214 (Roll no. 988).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 245.

vote.text: Passed Senate, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative (under the order of 12/22/2009), without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 39. Record Vote Number: 397.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 12/28/2009--Public Law. Increases the public debt limit from $12.104 trillion to $12.394 trillion.
